name: Deserted Saw
description:
a short endless and poorly made platformer bullet hell game.

HOW TO PLAY: dodge saws, ghosts or deflect them with your curser and kill ghosts (dont touch the player) and go to the portal to go to the next level 

CONTROLS: A and D to move around SPACE to jump 

first ever game i made for ct.js jam 2, there maybe bugs but im happy with what i created and had fun making aswell.
